Articles.Content: I was wondering if someone figured out a formula that would predict fuel consumption in a flight around the world. I already have the required numbers needed (0.30/s fuel, ~200/ms, Altitude of 2,000 m). Is there any available formula or technique for finding the required fuel?

r = 602000 m
Circumference = 2 * pi * r = 3782.5km
At 200 m/s = 18912 seconds for the trip

at .3 fuel per sec = 5674 fuel
